metadata.name: Journey Towards Edge Of The Cosmos
metadata.description:
Artist
Satadru Sovan

Journey of habitats to heaven. The world began the journey of extinct. Our own actions affect the environment and its inhabitants. The earth is home to innumerable species of flora and fauna. Due to natural reasons and human activities, some species have become extinct, and others are gradually disappearing from the face of the earth. This piece will dig deeper to help you understand the species that are endangered vs threatened vs extinct.
